languageModelTools.modelDescription: Check all SLATE ecosystem dependencies: Python, Git, GPU, PyTorch, Ollama, Docker, VS Code extension.

languageModelTools.modelDescription: Run an arbitrary SLATE Python command and return the output. Use for custom operations.

languageModelTools.name: slate_forkCheck
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Check contributor forks for updates, pending integrations, and sync status. Actions: status, sync, check, list.

languageModelTools.name: slate_securityAudit
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Run security scans: ActionGuard (dangerous patterns), PII Scanner (credential leaks), SDK Source Guard (trusted publishers). Scan: full, actionguard, pii, sdk.

languageModelTools.name: slate_agentStatus
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Check agent registry, autonomous loop status, copilot runner bridge, and integrated loop. Actions: status, discover, integrated.

languageModelTools.name: slate_gpuManager
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Manage dual-GPU configuration: load balancing, model preloading, VRAM status. Actions: status, configure, preload.

languageModelTools.name: slate_autonomous
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Control the autonomous task loop: check status, discover tasks, execute a single task, or run multiple tasks. Actions: status, discover, single, run (with max parameter).

max.description: Maximum tasks to execute (only with action='run', default 5)

languageModelTools.name: slate_runProtocol
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Run the full guided SLATE protocol sequence: (1) system health, (2) runtime integrations, (3) workflow status, (4) enforce completion. Ensures all systems are 'locked in' for development.

languageModelTools.name: slate_handoff
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Hand off a task to the SLATE autonomous agent for background execution. The chat participant identifies the work, then queues it for the autonomous loop to complete.

task.description: Description of the task to hand off to the autonomous agent

languageModelTools.name: slate_startServices
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Start all SLATE services in one action: orchestrator (dashboard, runner, monitor) and copilot runner bridge for autonomous task processing.

languageModelTools.name: slate_executeWork
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Aggressive work execution pipeline: (1) cleanup stale tasks, (2) discover available work, (3) execute up to N tasks via autonomous agent, (4) verify final state. Use this to DO work, not just report on it.

max.description: Maximum number of tasks to execute (default 3)

languageModelTools.name: slate_agentBridge
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Bidirectional bridge between the @slate chat participant and the SLATE autonomous loop. Poll for tasks dispatched by the autonomous system (COPILOT_CHAT agent), complete them, check bridge status, or cleanup stale entries. This makes @slate a first-class subagent in the SLATE agent registry.

action.description: Bridge action: 'poll' (get pending tasks), 'status' (bridge health), 'complete' (mark task done), 'cleanup' (remove stale)

taskId.description: Task ID to complete (required for 'complete' action)

languageModelTools.name: slate_devCycle
languageModelTools.modelDescription: View or manage the SLATE development cycle: current stage (plan/code/test/deploy/feedback), recent activities, and stage transitions. Actions: status, transition, activities, guidance.

stage.description: Target stage for transition (only with action='transition')

languageModelTools.name: slate_specKit
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Manage SLATE specifications: list, process, AI-analyze, generate wiki docs, and extract development roadmap. Actions: status, list, process, analyze, wiki, roadmap.

specId.description: Specific spec ID to process or analyze (optional)

languageModelTools.name: slate_learningProgress
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Track learning progress, XP, achievements, and guided learning paths. Actions: status, paths, achievements, next, complete.

stepId.description: Step ID to mark complete (required for 'complete' action)

languageModelTools.name: slate_planContext
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get compressed SLATE plan context for efficient LLM usage: current dev stage, task counts, spec summaries, and code directives. Token-optimized. Scopes: full, cycle, tasks, specs, guidance.

scope.description: Context scope: 'full' (all), 'cycle' (dev stage only), 'tasks' (task counts), 'specs' (spec list), 'guidance' (code directives)

languageModelTools.name: slate_codeGuidance
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get stage-aware code guidance for a specific file or context. Returns file-type-specific best practices aligned with the current development stage.

file.description: File path to get guidance for (uses extension to determine language)

context.description: Additional context about what you're working on

languageModelTools.name: slate_ciMonitor
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Monitor GitHub Actions CI/CD: list recent runs, check active runs, dispatch workflows, get job logs, cancel or re-run failed jobs. Deep integration with the self-hosted slate-runner.

action.description: CI action: 'runs' (list recent), 'status' (active runs), 'dispatch' (trigger workflow), 'logs' (job details), 'cancel', 'rerun'

runId.description: Workflow run ID for logs/cancel/rerun actions

languageModelTools.name: slate_prManager
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Manage GitHub pull requests: list open PRs, create new PRs, check PR status with check runs. Integrates with SLATE workflow for task-to-PR lifecycle.

action.description: PR action: 'list' (open PRs), 'create' (new PR), 'status' (check PR with CI status)

branch.description: Source branch for creating a PR

languageModelTools.name: slate_issueTracker
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Manage GitHub issues: list open issues, create new issues with labels, close issues, add comments. Bridges SLATE task management with GitHub issue tracking.

languageModelTools.name: slate_semanticKernel
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Microsoft Semantic Kernel integration: check status, list plugins, run inference via local Ollama models with SK function calling, or benchmark SK pipeline performance. Uses SLATE custom models (slate-coder, slate-fast, slate-planner) with ChromaDB RAG memory.

action.description: SK action: 'status' (integration health), 'plugins' (list SK plugins), 'invoke' (run prompt through SK), 'benchmark' (SK inference perf)

model.description: Model role: code, fast, planner, general

languageModelTools.name: slate_gitOps
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Git source control operations: check status, list branches, view commit log, show diff stats, list stashes. Provides repository awareness for the @slate agent.

languageModelTools.name: slate_githubModels
languageModelTools.modelDescription: GitHub Models free-tier cloud AI inference: check status and rate limits, list available models (GPT-4o, GPT-4o-mini, Mistral, DeepSeek-R1, Phi-4, Llama, etc.), send chat prompts, run with Ollama fallback chain, or benchmark API performance. 11 models, 15 RPM / 150 RPD rate limits, no cost.

action.description: GitHub Models action: 'status' (auth + rate limits), 'list' (available models), 'chat' (send prompt), 'fallback' (GitHub→Ollama chain), 'benchmark' (API perf)

model.description: Model name for 'chat' action (e.g., gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini, DeepSeek-R1)

role.description: SLATE role mapping for 'fallback' action: code, fast, planner, analysis, reasoning, summary, general

languageModelTools.name: slate_kubernetes
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Kubernetes deployment management for SLATE: check cluster status (pods, deployments, services), run health checks, deploy manifests (raw kubectl or Kustomize overlays), teardown, view component logs, set up port forwarding, or preload ML models. Manages the slate namespace with 7 deployments, 5 CronJobs, HPAs, PDBs, and Ingress.

action.description: K8s action: 'status' (cluster overview), 'health' (deep health check), 'deploy' (apply manifests), 'deploy-kustomize' (apply with overlay), 'teardown' (remove all), 'logs' (component logs), 'port-forward' (local access), 'preload-models' (ML model init)

component.description: Component name for 'logs' action (e.g., core, ollama, vectorstore, agent-router, autonomous-loop, copilot-bridge, workflow-manager)

overlay.description: Kustomize overlay for 'deploy-kustomize' action (e.g., local, dev, staging, prod)

languageModelTools.name: slate_adaptiveInstructions
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Adaptive Instruction Layer — K8s-driven dynamic instruction controller. Evaluates system state (K8s pods, GPUs, services, workflows) and generates context-aware instruction overrides stored in the slate-instructions ConfigMap. Controls operating mode (normal/degraded/maintenance/emergency/autonomous), agent availability (full/gpu-only/cpu-only/minimal), tool routing, and behavioral directives. The source of truth for all SLATE agent and Copilot instruction behaviors.

action.description: Instruction action: 'status' (current state), 'evaluate' (analyze system), 'sync' (evaluate+apply to K8s), 'get-context' (instruction block for sessions), 'get-active' (active set from K8s), 'apply' (push to ConfigMap)

languageModelTools.name: slate_forge
languageModelTools.modelDescription: FORGE.md collaborative AI operations log — the shared append-only log for AI team members (Copilot, Antigravity, autonomous agents). FORGE = Framework for Orchestrated Research, Generation & Evolution. Use to read teammate updates, append new entries, check collaboration status, and sync the FORGE log across Docker volumes and MCP. Entries are timestamped with format: [AgentName] YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ | Action: description. Sections: STATUS, PLAN, OUTPUT, HANDOFF, MAGIC (super prompts).

action.description: FORGE action: 'read' (view log, optionally filtered), 'append' (add new entry), 'status' (collaboration summary), 'sync' (sync with Docker/MCP)

entry.description: For 'append': the log entry text to add (auto-timestamped)

section.description: For 'read': filter by section (STATUS, PLAN, OUTPUT, HANDOFF, MAGIC)

filter.description: For 'read': text search filter across entries

languageModelTools.name: slate_promptIndex
languageModelTools.modelDescription: SLATE Prompt Index — manage and execute the 9 super prompts in prompts/index.json. Prompts are Ollama-routed automation workflows: system-health, deploy-kubernetes, run-benchmarks, workflow-cleanup, issue-to-task, pr-review, task-router, dashboard-sync, forge-collab. Each prompt targets a specific SLATE model (slate-coder 12B, slate-fast 3B, or slate-planner 7B) for local GPU inference. Use to list available prompts, get prompt contents, run a prompt through Ollama, validate prompt format, or rebuild the index.

action.description: Prompt action: 'list' (all prompts), 'get' (view one), 'run' (execute via Ollama), 'validate' (check format), 'index' (rebuild index.json)

prompt.description: For 'run': additional context to inject into the prompt

model.description: For 'run': override the default model (slate-coder, slate-fast, slate-planner)

slate.background.enabled.description: Enable the evolving SLATE schematic background. The background reflects system progress and updates as your SLATE installation evolves.

slate.background.opacity.description: Opacity of the schematic background (0.01-0.3). Lower values are more subtle.
